bno055_ros.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import math
4 
5 import BNO055
6 
7 import rospy
8 from std_msgs.msg import Header
9 from sensor_msgs.msg import Imu
10 from geometry_msgs.msg import Quaternion
11 from geometry_msgs.msg import Vector3
12 from bno055.msg import bno055_info
13 
14 def publisher():
15  dataPub = rospy.Publisher('rov/bno055', Imu, queue_size=3)
16  infoPub = rospy.Publisher('rov/bno055_info', bno055_info, queue_size=3)
17  rospy.init_node('bno055')
18  rate = rospy.Rate(30) #30Hz data read
19 
20  # Setup BNO055
21  # Create and configure the BNO sensor connection.
22  # Raspberry Pi configuration with I2C and RST connected to GPIO 27:
23  sensor = BNO055.BNO055(rst=27)
24 
25  attempts = 0
26  # Initialize the BNO055 and stop if something went wrong.
27  while(attempts < 10):
28  try:
29  sensor.begin()
30  break
31  except Exception as e:
32  rospy.logerr('Failed to initialize BNO055! %s', e)
33  attempts += 1
34  rospy.sleep(0.25)
35 
36  if(attempts == 10):
37  rospy.logerr('Failed to initialize BNO055! Program end')
38  exit(1)
39 
40  # Print system status and self test result.
41  try:
42  status, self_test, error = sensor.get_system_status()
43  except Exception as e:
44  rospy.logerr('Failed to read BNO055 system status! %s', e)
45 
46  rospy.logdebug('System status: %s', status)
47  rospy.logdebug('Self test result (0x0F is normal): %s', hex(self_test))
48  # Print out an error if system status is in error mode.
49  if(status == 0x01):
50  rospy.logerr('System error: %s', error)
51  rospy.logerr('See datasheet section 4.3.59 for the meaning.')
52 
53  # Print BNO055 software revision and other diagnostic data.
54  try:
55  sw, bl, accel, mag, gyro = sensor.get_revision()
56  except Exception as e:
57  rospy.logerr('Failed to read BNO055 meta-inforamtion! %s', e)
58 
59  rospy.loginfo('Software version: %d', sw)
60  rospy.loginfo('Bootloader version: %d', bl)
61  rospy.loginfo('Accelerometer ID: %s', hex(accel))
62  rospy.loginfo('Magnetometer ID: %s', hex(mag))
63  rospy.loginfo('Gyroscope ID: %s', hex(gyro))
64 
65  rospy.loginfo('Reading BNO055 data...')
66 
67  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
68  # Define messages
69  msgHeader = Header()
70  infoHeader = Header()
71  msg = Imu()
72  info = bno055_info()
73 
74  orientation = Quaternion()
75  angular_vel = Vector3()
76  linear_accel = Vector3()
77 
78  #no covarience vlaues known
79 
80  # Update data
81 
82  attempts = 0
83  while(attempts < 4):
84  try:
85  # Read the calibration status, 0=uncalibrated and 3=fully calibrated.
86  sys, gyro, accel, mag = sensor.get_calibration_status()
87  temp_c = sensor.read_temp()
88  break
89  except Exception as e:
90  rospy.logerr('Failed to read BNO055 calibration stat and temp! %s', e)
91  attempts += 1
92  rospy.sleep(0.01)
93 
94  if(attempts != 4):
95  info.sysCalibration = sys
96  info.accelCalibration = accel
97  info.gyroCalibration = gyro
98  info.magnoCalibration = mag
99  info.tempC = temp_c
100 
101 
102  attempts = 0
103  while(attempts < 4):
104  try:
105  # Orientation as a quaternion:
106  orientation.x, orientation.y, orientation.z, orientation.w = sensor.read_quaternion()
107 
108  # Gyroscope data (in degrees per second converted to radians per second):
109  gry_x, gry_y, gry_z = sensor.read_gyroscope()
110  angular_vel.x = math.radians(gry_x)
111  angular_vel.y = math.radians(gry_y)
112  angular_vel.z = math.radians(gry_z)
113 
114  # Linear acceleration data (i.e. acceleration from movement, not gravity--
115  # returned in meters per second squared):
116  linear_accel.x, linear_accel.y, linear_accel.z = sensor.read_linear_acceleration()
117  break
118  except Exception as e:
119  rospy.logerr('Failed to read BNO055 data! %s', e)
120  attempts += 1
121  rospy.sleep(0.01)
122 
123  if(attempts != 4):
124  msg.orientation = orientation
125  msg.angular_velocity = angular_vel
126  msg.linear_acceleration = linear_accel
127 
128  #update message headers
129  msgHeader.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
130  msgHeader.frame_id = 'imu_data'
131  msg.header = msgHeader
132 
133  infoHeader.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
134  infoHeader.frame_id = 'imu_info'
135  info.header = infoHeader
136 
137  dataPub.publish(msg)
138  infoPub.publish(info)
139 
140  rate.sleep()
141 
142 if __name__ == '__main__':
143  try:
144  publisher()
145  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
146  pass
147 
148 # Unused functions
149 # Read the Euler angles for heading, roll, pitch (all in degrees).
150 # heading, roll, pitch = sensor.read_euler()
151 # Magnetometer data (in micro-Teslas):
152 # x,y,z = sensor.read_magnetometer()
153 # Accelerometer data (in meters per second squared):
154 # x,y,z = sensor.read_accelerometer()
155 # Gravity acceleration data (i.e. acceleration just from gravity--returned
156 # in meters per second squared):
157 # x,y,z = sensor.read_gravity()
